title: About elementalist lux - the 3250RP version and the 3950RP version
body:
What happens if I buy the 3250RP version now and later on I buy the 3950RP version?

If the 3950 version indeed exists as a bundle, then it should reasonably be purchasable if you have the skin (at a price of 700 RP).

replies.body: The bundle is flexible, so the 3950 bundle will be at a reduced price for anything not yet unlocked.  Hope that helps!

The Elementalist Lux Bundle, much like *most bundles* is a [Flexible Bundle](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/flexible-cost-bundles-available-now-0). This means that it will automatically adjust in price depending on what bundle content you already own.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I gotchu fam, i was gonna get the 3950 RP but i was 193 RP short :( so i just got the 3250 RP one and the bundle is priced at 700 RP
